title: Chocreaper
author: Chocreaper
created_time: December 16, 2022, 07:02:19 PMLast edit: December 17, 2022, 04:53:29 AM by Chocreaper

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Chocreaper on December 16, 2022, 07:02:19 PMSelling the "Adin" username on Kick.com, Kick.com is the new platform owned by stake, AdinRoss will be moving there for sure. I also have the "adinross" username but don't know if I want to sell it as of now, But if there's an offer that is too hard not to refuse I'll take it   Price is 1.5k for The Adin username. We would use a middle man in the forum who is highly trusted. We can always negotiate the price, Let me know in the comments.Do the Terms of service of that webpage even allow people to sell/exchange or share accounts?Is there any warranty you won't have any way to access by e-mail/phone/security key recuperation after the fulfilling of the purchase? Are you willing to take the cost of the escrow yourself instead whoever decides to buy this account from you?Also, I am not completely sure but this thread may belong to the Marketplace instead being here.

comments.author: Chocreaper
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on December 16, 2022, 07:13:19 PMQuote from: Chocreaper on December 16, 2022, 07:02:19 PMSelling the "Adin" username on Kick.com, Kick.com is the new platform owned by stake, AdinRoss will be moving there for sure. I also have the "adinross" username but don't know if I want to sell it as of now, But if there's an offer that is too hard not to refuse I'll take it   Price is 1.5k for The Adin username. We would use a middle man in the forum who is highly trusted. We can always negotiate the price, Let me know in the comments.Do the Terms of service of that webpage even allow people to sell/exchange or share accounts?Is there any warranty you won't have any way to access by e-mail/phone/security key recuperation after the fulfilling of the purchase? Are you willing to take the cost of the escrow yourself instead whoever decides to buy this account from you?Also, I am not completely sure but this thread may belong to the Marketplace instead being here.Terms do not mention that, infact they know I have multiple accounts, I had my adinross acount banned, and they unbanned it as they had a mistake in their part. (Still a new platform)I cannot access the account, as long as u change the email and you enable 2 factor for even more security, there's no way I can access it then.I'm not familiar on how much the escrow costs but sure, it would come out of the money that you or someone else pays with. so 1.5 - escrow cost.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Why would someone want that username? Just because it's the same 1st name as a streamer? It amazes me what some of you people think will have some value. $1500 are you insane lmao. At most it's worth $.25 and that's being generous.

comments.author: Chocreaper
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on December 17, 2022, 03:31:15 AMWhy would someone want that username? Just because it's the same 1st name as a streamer? It amazes me what some of you people think will have some value. $1500 are you insane lmao. At most it's worth $.25 and that's being generous.Already got an offer for 500$... It's way to low, Ur delusional thinking it's .25$, But hey that's your opinion. Cheers and have a good one.

I wouldn't be surprised if you say that the account is already sold. anyway, good luck to you.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on December 17, 2022, 03:31:15 AMWhy would someone want that username? Just because it's the same 1st name as a streamer? It amazes me what some of you people think will have some value. $1500 are you insane lmao. At most it's worth $.25 and that's being generous.Op is clearly out of his mind, let's say Adinross wants to create an account on kick.com, he will search for AdinRoss or Adin if he couldn't find that particular username, he will just add one or two numbers or later. I don't want to disappoint the OP but I am sure no one is going to buy a username if Adin is desperate for that username simply kick.com will remove your account and give it to him.
